.. _`GSEA NCG`:

GSEA NCG
========

Perform GSE analysis on Network of Cancer Genes





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_gseNCG:
        input:
            rds = "geneList.RDS"
        output:
            rds = "gseNCG.RDS",
            tsv = "gseNCG.tsv"
        params:
            gseNCG_extra = "pvalueCutoff  = 1, pAdjustMethod = 'BH', by = 'DOSE'"
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-211-g6a5c5194/bio/clusterProfiler/gseNCG"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.



Notes
-----

The geneList object if described in the
DESeq2_to_geneList wrapper

Human only

Parameters:
  * gseNCG_extra: Extra parameters for gseNCG, besides "gene", "readable", and "verbose"




Authors
-------


* Thibault Dayris



Code
----
